alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Harrison; Jefferson; Tuscarawas (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 23 at 1:33PM EDT until July 23 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN HARRISON...NORTHWESTERN JEFFERSON...CARROLL AND NORTHEASTERN TUSCARAWAS COUNTIES... At 133 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles southwest of Carrollton, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines, resulting in some power outages. Locations impacted include... Uhrichsville, Carrollton, Scio, Midvale, Bowerston, Dellroy, Sherrodsville, Roswell, Leesville, Atwood Lake, Kilgore, and Leesville Lake Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 412-262-1988, posting to the NWS Pittsburgh Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSPITTSBURGH.
